fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Channel the power of constellations in the night sky. Use the respective ability of any active constellation.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon, you may multitask, but can only use any given constellation once per night.
- You know what constellations are currently visible.
Constellations:
- Reticulum: Learn a player's role. Has a 50% chance to be visible each night. (80% with Necronomicon)
- Musca: Poison a player (Basic attack). Visible when the Coven lacks the Necronomicon.
- Aquila: Roleblock a player. Visible when no moon is out.
- Cygnus: Blackmail a player. Visible when any moon is out.
- Microscopium: Learn everyone who visited a player. Visible when an unmodified full moon is out.
- Lupus: Roleblock everyone who visits a player. Visible when any moon that is not a full moon (blood moon, hunting moon, etc) is out.
- Lyra: Heal a player. Visible when a non-Coven player was hanged today.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- Crux: Use the ability of a dead Coven member on another player. Visible when a Coven died to a non-good player (hanging doesn't count as non-good) the last day/night.
- Orion: Deal an Overkill attack to a player. Visible on Night 8 and beyond, or when you are the final Coven member.
- Phoenix: Revive any dead player. Has a 1% chance to be visible each night. For every dead Coven member, an extra percent is added to the odds of this being visible.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang everyone who would oppose the Coven.
